content: this winter-coat amigurumi stoat stands on all fours by itself and is 14in/36cm long the pattern is no-sew apart from the face embroidery the eyes however can be replaced with safety eyes the first pdf is large text easy to read on mobile the other file is smaller text for monitors both include identical pattern and photos for reference you will need - dk yarn in white less than 50g / 150m - dk yarn in grey/black less than 25g / 75m - a 3 5mm hook - a darning needle for its face embroidery - stuffing - scissors not a pattern for total beginners but not a difficult pattern in my opinion pattern designed by me and posted for free
